description: This fruity wine has bright acidity and a perfumed character. With its crisp texture, it is full of lemon and green apple fruit. Drink now.

title: Tortoise Creek 2013 Le Charmel Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
description: This light and fruity wine is fresh with lemon and light minerality. It is ready to drink, with its bright acidity and pear and apple aftertaste.

title: DFJ Vinhos 2010 Paxis Tinto Red (Lisboa)
description: This is a full, fruity, rich and concentrated wine. It has bright red berries, some firm tannins and a good dense texture. It's also light and crisp, with acidity that cuts through the ripe fruitiness. Drink now through 2019.

title: Château les Charmes Godard 2014  Francs Côtes de Bordeaux
description: This is a tight, mineral-driven wine with fresh acidity and a crisp character. Sémillon dominated, it conveys green fruits, bright acidity and a lively, tangy aftertaste. The wine is refreshing, fruity and ready to drink. Nicolas Thienpont and his brothers bought this 16-acre property in 1988.

title: Château Vircoulon 2014  Bordeaux Blanc
description: This delicious, fruity wine is full of acidity and crisp fruit. Light, bright and dominated by green and citrus fruits, it is ready to drink now.

title: Château Vircoulon 2014  Bordeaux Blanc
description: This delicious, fruity wine is full of acidity and crisp fruit. Light, bright and dominated by green and citrus fruits, it is ready to drink now.

title: Dona Maria-Júlio Bastos 2015 White (Alentejano)
description: This is an attractive, soft blend of Arinto, Viosinho and Antão Vaz. With white fruit flavors and a warm, ripe texture, it's crisp, fruity and ready to drink.

title: Fischer 2012 Classic Rosé (Thermenregion)
description: This is a lightly fruity wine with attractive red currant and raspberry flavors. It's bright, crisp, touched by vanilla and finished with citrus acidity. Screwcap.

title: Fischer 2012 Classic Rosé (Thermenregion)
description: This is a lightly fruity wine with attractive red currant and raspberry flavors. It's bright, crisp, touched by vanilla and finished with citrus acidity. Screwcap.

title: Domaine Jas d'Esclans 2016 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: This is a delicious fruity wine with a fine line of acidity that cuts right through the orange and red-currant fruits. It is bright with acidity and just a light mineral edge to give a textured and fruity aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Christophe Cordier 2013 Vieilles Vignes  (Mâcon)
description: Fresh fruit with apple acidity gives this wine a ready-to-drink character. It has an attractive lift of citrus and a light, crisp and fresh aftertaste.

title: Pinhal da Torre 2010 Quinta do Alqueve Tradicional Red (Tejo)
description: A ripe, juicy and fruity wine that has attractive black currant aromas, lively acidity on the palate and a light, bright feel. With open berry fruits, this wine is ready to drink.

title: Vignerons des Terres Secrètes 2014  Mâcon-Villages
description: Very young and crisp, this refreshingly fruity wine has intense acidity, strong citrus flavors and a light, bright aftertaste. Drink from 2016 for its acidity to soften.

title: Henri de Villamont 2014  Rully
description: Citrus fruits shine in this wine that offers attractive acidity along with lemon and crisp apple flavors. Bright, fruity and ready to drink soon, the wine has a nervy texture that will be delicious. Drink from 2017.

title: Sauvion 2016 Loire Valley  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
description: This is a soft and fruity wine, ripe with apple flavors and cut with a lightly mineral texture. The wine is bright, crisp and fruity, and ready to drink now.

title: Château de Brigue 2016 Les Meyans Elégance Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: The Cinsault that dominates this blend creates a light and gently fruity wine. It has attractive acidity and just the lightest of red-fruit flavors. The aftertaste is soft and tangy with orange zest.

title: Vignerons de Tutiac 2015 Château Lalande Bellevue Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description: This balanced, ripe and fruity wine is already refreshing and crisp. Plenty of red-currant flavors go along with the lively acidity and bright aftertaste.

title: Vignerons de Tutiac 2015 Château Lalande Bellevue Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description: This balanced, ripe and fruity wine is already refreshing and crisp. Plenty of red-currant flavors go along with the lively acidity and bright aftertaste.

title: Domaine de Lamothe 2015 White (Côtes de Gascogne)
description: A blend of Colombard and Chardonnay, this wine is crisp and fruity. It has attractive bright acidity with lemon fruitiness and a mineral texture. The wine is ready to drink.

title: Domaines Devillard 2011 Le Renard  (Bourgogne)
description: A forward, fruity wine, full of apple and creamed pear flavors. The acidity is light, bright and attractive giving a wine that is fresh and ready to drink.

title: Estandon 2016 Domaine de Caseneuve Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: This pale wine is light, bright and fruity. It has a tangy edge along with plenty of crisp acidity. The aftertaste is clean, packed with fruitiness with a soft texture.

title: M. & J-F Bertrand 2016 Fleur de Carbonnel Sauvignon Sauvignon Blanc (Vin de France)
description: This wine is fruity and soft, with hints of citrus and herbal flavors. Its acidity is bright and attractive. Drink now.

title: Emile Beyer 2013 Lieu dit Hohrain Pinot Gris (Alsace)
description: Crisp and fruity, this bright and fruity wine has attractive acidity as well as spice and a lightly tangy texture. It's still very fresh and needs time to deepen and become richer. Drink from 2016.

title: Simonnet-Febvre 2012  Saint-Bris
description: A soft, fruity wine, this features attractive citrus and peach flavors. It's light and fresh with a crisp, bright aftertaste. Saint-Bris is the only appellation in Burgundy to produce Sauvignon Blanc.

title: Casa Cadaval 2015 Vinha Padre Pedro Rosé (Tejo)
description: This is a ripe, fruity wine full of wild strawberry fruit. It is soft although with fine acidity and a crisp aftertaste. The wine is ready to drink.

title: Les Rocailles 2016 Rosé (Savoie)
description: Red currant aromas are an immediately attractive start for this light, fruity wine. With its crisp acidity and bright red currant and raspberry fruit, it's lively and ready to drink.

title: Au Pied du Mont Chauve 2012 Le Charmois Premier Cru  (Saint-Aubin)
description: This soft, fruity wine is pretty much ready to drink. With its red-berry fruits and fresh acidity it has a crisp side, although its round, ripe texture is so attractive. Drink from the end of 2016.

title: Wines & Winemakers 2012 Azul Portugal Escolha White (Vinho Verde)
description: Crisp. dry and fruity, this wine has a light touch of citrus and fresh acidity. Fruity with a slight sparkle, it's an ideal apéritif.

title: Maurice Ecard 2013  Bourgogne
description: This smooth, soft wine is light and fruity. It has some tannins although fresh berry fruit and perfumed acidity are what characterize this wine. Immediately attractive, it's a light wine from a light year, and is ready to drink now.

title: Château Labadie 2013  Médoc
description: A fruity wine full of red-berry flavors. This fruitiness is balanced by the light tannins and juicy acidity, producing a wine that is ready to drink.

title: Mas de la Dame 2012 La Stèle White (Les Baux de Provence)
description: This citrus flavored wine is fruity and crisp with bright acidity and just a hint of herbal character. The wine is light, bright and ready to drink.

title: Commanderie de la Bargemone 2013 Rosé (Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence)
description: This wine has the lightest of rosé colors, so fresh and light and fruity. With crisp acidity, raspberry and red currants, it just dances on the palate.

title: Pinhal da Torre 2015 Alqueve Tradicional Red (Tejo)
description: This is a fruity, ripe blend of Touriga Nacional, Tinta Roriz and Castelão. Soft, with a touch of spice from wood, it also has a crisp edge of acidity. Drink this attractive wine now.

title: Cortes de Cima 2014 Chaminé White (Alentejano)
description: This is a soft, fruity and lightly crisp wine. It has citrus and warm yellow-fruit flavors and tangy orange peel acidity. Drink this fresh and light wine now.

title: Wines & Winemakers 2014 Monta da Baía Rosé (Península de Setúbal)
description: A fruity, young and crisp wine that is all about raspberry and red currant fruits. It is fresh with just a hint of caramel and with bright acidity at the end.

title: Château Lamothe Bouscaut 2013  Pessac-Léognan
description: All spice, acidity and tangy herbal flavors, this rich wine is also very fresh. It's full of green fruits and lively acidity. The aftertaste is crisp but ripe. The property has been owned since 1999 by Sophie Lurton of neighbor Château Bouscaut.

title: Maison Bouey 2016 Château Baruaud  (Bordeaux Blanc)
description: Spicy and fruity, this light, balanced wine has easy, crisp fruit and bright acidity showing citrus and spiciness. It is a refreshing wine, ready to drink now.

title: Domaine Laurens 2016 Cuvée Eglantine  (Marcillac)
description: This is a delicious fruity wine, pink in color and with a swathe of crisp red-currant fruitiness. It is bright with acidity and forward fruit. Drink this attractive wine now.

title: Cortes de Cima 2011 Trincadeira (Alentejano)
description: Full and fruity, this soft, generous wine brings out red berries, ripe tannins and a light touch of acidity. There is a drier core, but the wine is ready to drink, with attractive freshness at the end.

title: Domaine Charles Frey 2010 Plaisir Perlant Millesimé Extra Brut Sparkling (Crémant d'Alsace)
description: Strong, attractive apple aromas also give the flavor profile of this fresh and fruity wine. It has a light tangy, zesty texture, fresh acidity and a bright, mineral aftertaste.

title: Domaine Charles Frey 2010 Plaisir Perlant Millesimé Extra Brut Sparkling (Crémant d'Alsace)
description: Strong, attractive apple aromas also give the flavor profile of this fresh and fruity wine. It has a light tangy, zesty texture, fresh acidity and a bright, mineral aftertaste.

title: Domaine de Sulauze 2012 Liane Red (Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence)
description: The wine is very fresh and fruity with lively red-berry flavors balanced delicately with light tannins and acidity. It's refreshing with a red currant aftertaste.

title: Maison des 3 Ponts 2014 Lepontis Sauvignon Blanc (Charentais)
description: From the Cognac region, this fresh and fruity wine is light and bright with herbal flavors, crisp citrus and intense acidity. It's ready to drink.

title: Thorin 2011 Nouveau  (Beaujolais)
description: Bright red cherry fruits, fresh and light with fruit acidity and the minimum of tannins.

title: Quinta de la Rosa 2013 Dourosa Branco White (Douro)
description: This is a bright and fruity wine that is also rich. Yellow fruits are accompanied by fresh, textured citrus and given a crisp aftertaste by the lively acidity. Drink now.

title: Nuiton-Beaunoy 2010 Les Dames Huguettes  (Hautes Côtes de Nuits)
description: Fragrant and perfumed, this has a smoky character and crisp fruit, while remaining attractively ripe. The tannins are soft, and the acidity on the finish is fruity.

title: Château Bélingard 2014 Bélingard  (Bergerac Rosé)
description: Quite pale, this blend of Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot is soft, fruity and ready to drink. Attractive red fruits and light acidity give a tangy, fresh aftertaste.

title: Tinhof 2012 Rosé (Burgenland)
description: This Blaufränkisch rosé is light, fruity and just off dry. It has attractive red-berry acidity and a very fresh character. Ready to drink now. Screwcap.

title: Herdade do Esporão 2015 Monte Velho Red (Alentejano)
description: This fruity red wine is one of Portugal's best sellers. Along with its red fruit and attractive acidity it is soft with just an edge of tannins. Drink this young wine now.

title: Producta Vignobles 2013 Roc des Chevaliers  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
description: With soft tannins and fresh fruits, this light, crisp wine has a red fruit-flavored character that is intense in its acidity. Drink now.

title: Domaine Torraccia 2016 Vermentino (Corse Porto Vecchio)
description: This fruity wine is light with apple flavors and a touch of honey. Its acidity and floral character bring out a crisp texture, and its ripe fruitiness is refreshingly attractive. Drink now.

title: Borges 2009 Meia Encosta Red (Dão)
description: Light and fresh with soft tannins, this is an attractive, ready-to-drink wine. It has layers of acidity over red fruits.

title: Domaine Louis Moreau 2014  Chablis
description: A light approach to Chablis, this brings out crisp fruitiness, attractive acidity, apple flavors and a touch of steeliness. With its creamy, ripe aftertaste, the wine is ready to drink.

title: Château Grand Bourgeau 2016  Bordeaux Blanc
description: This ripe wine is fruity, with both citrus and tropical flavors. Light and bright, with a crisp, tangy texture, it's ready to drink.

title: Château Bellevue la Forêt 2014 L'Allégresse Rosé (Fronton)
description: This fresh blend of Négrette with both Cabernets is fruity and lightly crisp with refreshing final acidity. It's bright, while also having a ripe character that allows it to broaden out. Drink now.

title: Robert Perroud 2014 L'Enfer des Balloquets  (Brouilly)
description: Very fresh, fruity and drinkable, this is a soft, red-cherry-flavored wine. Attractive acidity bursts out of the glass with a perfumed, tangy aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Robert Perroud 2014 L'Enfer des Balloquets  (Brouilly)
description: Very fresh, fruity and drinkable, this is a soft, red-cherry-flavored wine. Attractive acidity bursts out of the glass with a perfumed, tangy aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Domaine Chasselay 2010 Les Grands Eparcieux  (Beaujolais)
description: A ripe, fruity wine with a light structure of tannins and acidity, it has some density while remaining fruity and juicy. The red cherry fruit blends into the closing acidity.

title: Château les Valentines 2015 Le Caprice de Clémentine Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: This is the equivalent of a second wine from Les Valentines, a lighter version of the estate wine. With lively acidity, it is fruity while rounded, crisp but also sweet with ripe strawberry flavors. The acidity at the end is soft, light and bright.

title: Les Frères Perroud 2015 Vieilles Vignes  (Brouilly)
description: A bright and juicy wine from this often easygoing appellation. The red-cherry fruitiness and attractive acidity make for a wine that is rounded and ripe. It is ready to drink, crisp and fruity at the end.

title: Louis Max 2014  Chablis
description: Fresh, light and fruity this is attractive young Chablis. It is soft, dwelling on the fruit rather than any texture. Crisp and with citrus and green apple flavors, it will be ready to drink easily by mid-2016.

title: Sauvion 2015  Rosé d'Anjou
description: This is a fresh and crisp wine with touches of sweetness. Red fruits are combined with ripe apple and acidity to give a lively fruity wine. Drink now.

title: DFJ Vinhos 2015 Casa do Lago Branco White (Lisboa)
description: This is a soft, fruity wine that has attractive citrus and ripe apricot fruits. It has just a touch of spice to balance the acidity and the tangy texture. Drink now.

title: Cap Royal 2014  Bordeaux Supérieur
description: Spicy from the wood aging, this wine is rich, fruity and ready to drink. It has red fruit and acidity along with a smooth texture that gives it an attractive and ripe aftertaste.

title: Château Vieux Porier 2014  Bordeaux
description: This is a light wine with bright acidity and red fruit flavors. It has a mere touch of tannin to give structure to the crisp aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Baron Philippe de Rothschild 2014 Le Rosé de Mouton Cadet Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description: This wine is fruity and crisp, with attractive balanced acidity. It's all about raspberry and red currants. A refreshing character gives citrus tang to the aftertaste.

title: Ravoire et Fils 2015 Domaine des Martyrs Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: This 25-acre, family-owned estate has produced a fruity, lighthearted wine. With crisp red-currant flavors and poised acidity, the wine is lively and bright. A light touch of spice adds a twist to the aftertaste.

title: Quinta da Ribeirinha 2016 Ardósia Rosado Rosado (Tejo)
description: A crisp, fruity blend of Touriga Nacional and Aragonez, this wine is bright and light. Its refreshing acidity and red-currant fruits are delicious to drink now.

title: Joseph Drouhin 2016  Mâcon-Villages
description: This wine is crisp and refreshingly fruity. A lively texture gives brightness, and a light touch of acidity finishes the wine on a citrus note. Drink now.

title: Philippe Viallet 2016 Savoie Rosé (Vin de Savoie)
description: Made from 100% Gamay, this is a crisp wine with attractive acidity, red currant fruit and a spicy aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Philippe Viallet 2016 Savoie Rosé (Vin de Savoie)
description: Made from 100% Gamay, this is a crisp wine with attractive acidity, red currant fruit and a spicy aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Château Pas du Cerf 2014 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: A classic rosé blend of Grenache and Cinsault, this is soft, crisp and fruity. The smooth texture gains attractive lift from acidity and raspberry fruits. It is light and bright at the end.

title: Château Pas du Cerf 2014 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: A classic rosé blend of Grenache and Cinsault, this is soft, crisp and fruity. The smooth texture gains attractive lift from acidity and raspberry fruits. It is light and bright at the end.

title: Lionel Osmin & Cie 2015 Duras-Braucol Red (Gaillac)
description: This wine brings together the two native grapes of Gaillac in one ripe, light and fruity whole. It has soft tannins and fine juicy acidity. There is a youthful rusticity to the wine and a crisp bright red-fruit aftertaste. Drink from 2018.

title: Aimé Roquesante 2014 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: It's a light and fruity wine, with a delicate texture and bright acidity. Soft and crisp, it's fine for an apéritif.

title: Château Roustaing 2011  Bordeaux
description: Light and already fruity, this wine features attractive black-currant flavors, bright acidity and soft tannins. Ready to drink.

title: Vignerons de Bel Air 2015 Automne Ensoleillé  (Beaujolais)
description: The wine is light and instantly fruity. It has red fruits and soft acidity, giving an warm rounded aftertaste.

title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2015 Les Jolies Filles Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: Pale onion skin in color, this is a soft fruity wine. It has attractive red-fruit flavors and light acidity. With a salty tang as well as some minerality, the wine is crisp and fruity right to the end.

title: Terra Silvestre 2014 Arinto (Tejo)
description: A lemon flavored wine that's crisp and fruity. The texture is soft with fruit and fresh acidity dominant. With its refreshing aftertaste, the wine is ready to drink now.

title: Terra Silvestre 2014 Arinto (Tejo)
description: A lemon flavored wine that's crisp and fruity. The texture is soft with fruit and fresh acidity dominant. With its refreshing aftertaste, the wine is ready to drink now.

title: Domaine de l'Idylle 2014 Cruet Altesse (Vin de Savoie)
description: This light, fresh and creamy wine balances cool acidity and bright citrus and apple-peel flavors. It is poised, fruity with a crisp, refreshing aftertaste.

title: J. Portugal Ramos 2016 Pouca Roupa Rosé (Alentejano)
description: This is a really refreshing style of rosé. Its fruity raspberry and red-currant flavors are shot through with fine acidity and a lively crisp aftertaste. Drink this attractive wine now.

title: Château Fonfroide 2014 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description: Tight, bright and very crisp, this is a lively and fruity wine. Citrus fruit flavors compete happily with the red berries to give a bone-dry wine, light and fresh at the end.

title: Joseph Drouhin 2012  Chorey-lès-Beaune
description: This wine is fresh, perfumed with a juicy red-fruit character. It offers red cherries, with a soft texture and acidity. The great fruitiness leads to a bright, crisp aftertaste.

title: Château Carignan 2016 Château Léon Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description: This 19th-century chateau is situated on the plateau above the Garonne near Cadillac. A soft wine, it's lightly fruity and with a crisp edge. It offers attractive red-berry fruits and just the right acidity. Drink now.

title: Domaine les Capréoles 2015 Chamodère  (Régnié)
description: A soft and fruity wine that has lively acidity and light tannins. The wine is finely balanced, full of red-cherry flavors. It's an immediately attractive, ripe cru wine that is ready to drink.

title: DFJ Vinhos 2016 Escada Arinto (Lisboa)
description: Fresh, crisp Arinto gives a fine lemon and sliced apple character to this light soft wine. With its bright fruit, crisp acidity and tangy texture, it is totally ready to drink.

title: Ollivier Frères 2015 Domaine de la Grenaudière La Grenouille Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
description: The wine is crisp, tight, full of attractive acidity and citrus flavors. There is a mineral element to the wine that gives the texture a fine bite. It is fruity, bright with acidity and ready to drink.

title: Château de Lavernette 2016 Château de Lavernette  (Beaujolais-Villages)
description: Produced from organically grown grapes, this soft, fruity wine is full of red-cherry fruits. It also offers a touch of banana flavor as well as acidity and a bright, crisp juicy aftertaste. Drink now.

title: José Maria da Fonseca 2014 Periquita Original Red (Península de Setúbal)
description: One of the most popular Portuguese brands, made since 1850, this latest vintage is fresh and fruity. It has attractive red berry fruits and a light structure of tannins. This wine is fresh and ready to drink.

title: Alliance Loire 2014 Demoiselle Bleue  (Cabernet d'Anjou)
description: This sweet rosé is light, with some attractive ripe strawberry flavors. Grapefruit acidity gives it a fresher side, lifting the bright, fruity aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Bret Brothers 2014 Climat En Carementrant  (Pouilly-Fuissé)
description: At 1,100 feet, this high-altitude vineyard yields a crisp and tangy wine. The brothers, whom Becky Wasserman lists among the Fuissé “revolutionaries,” employ biodynamic practices. The wine has great swathes of bright acidity and a tight, mineral texture. With lively acidity, it is a bright, fruity wine to drink now.

title: Louis Jadot 2014  Mâcon-Villages
description: This wine is fruity, with crisp, fresh lemon flavors. It is lightly textured and smooth, with green fruit acidity and a creamy aftertaste. Drink from 2016.

title: Pezat 2012  Bordeaux
description: This offers soft, ripe fruit with acidity, delicious forward tannins and cherry flavors. Bright and fruity, the wine is ready to drink.

title: Château Haut Pougnan 2015  Bordeaux
description: A fruity, perfumed wine that has attractive acidity as well as spice. The black currant fruit gives the wine a crisp edge as well as an easy approachability. Drink now.

title: Labouré-Roi 2015  Mâcon-Villages
description: This fruity wine, free from any oak aging, revels in its attractive tropical flavors. It's as ripe and rich as the vintage suggests, with light, balanced acidity. The aftertaste is soft, keeping up the fruitiness. Drink now.

title: Quinta da Alorna 2014 White (Tejo)
description: This is an attractive, ready-to-drink wine, a blend of Arinto and Fernão Pires. Bright and fruity with plenty of citrus freshness, it is lightly crisp and fresh at the end.

title: Château de Lagorce 2015  Bordeaux
description: The wine is all juicy red-currant and berry fruits. With light tannins and a crisp edge the wine is fruity and ready to drink.

title: Evening Land 2011 Château de Bligny  (Côte de Nuits-Villages)
description: Lightly tannic and attractively fruity, it's ready to drink. It has a soft structure, red fruits and a finish that is full of bright acidity.

title: Domaine Ferret 2014  Pouilly-Fuissé
description: This wine is crisp and fruity. It has attractive acidity, a nice touch of spice and a backbone of minerality. The juiciness leaves a bright, crisp aftertaste.

title: Domaine Ferret 2014  Pouilly-Fuissé
description: This wine is crisp and fruity. It has attractive acidity, a nice touch of spice and a backbone of minerality. The juiciness leaves a bright, crisp aftertaste.

title: Château Barbanau 2011 L'Instant Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: This is a bright, fresh raspberry-flavored wine. It's fruity and layered with attractive, crisp acidity. A touch of spice accents the finish.

title: Global Wines 2015 Xadrez White (Vinho Verde)
description: This is a bright, fruity, off-dry wine that is crisp and clean. It has a fine light touch of acidity and white fruits. Aromatic and attractively perfumed, it is ready now.

title: Lavradores de Feitoria 2013 Branco White (Douro)
description: Crisp, lemon fresh and fruity, this is an attractive wine to drink now. It has some richness from the mineral texture and the tangy orange edge. The aftertaste continues the fruity theme.

title: Jean Reverdy et Fils 2013 Les Villots  (Sancerre)
description: Ripe, soft red cherry fruits are linked to a light texture and soft tannins in this ready-to-drink wine. The final acidity brings out the attractive fruitiness of this fresh wine. Drink now.

title: Georges Duboeuf 2015 Flower Label  (Brouilly)
description: The wine is soft and fruity. Red berry and cherry flavors have a hint of banana as well as the layers of crisp acidity. Drink this fresh wine now.

title: Château Sainte-Béatrice 2016 Cuvée des Princes Rosé (Var)
description: This is a soft pretty wine with a light fruity character. It is gently fruity, finishing with a peppery edge and crisp acidity. Drink now.

title: Château Sainte-Béatrice 2016 Cuvée des Princes Rosé (Var)
description: This is a soft pretty wine with a light fruity character. It is gently fruity, finishing with a peppery edge and crisp acidity. Drink now.

title: Gunter Triebaumer 2007 Trie White (Burgenland)
description: An attractive, perfumed blend of Chardonnay and Muscat grapes, very summery, fresh and crisp. There's lively acidity, quince and pear flavors and a vibrant fruity aftertaste. Screwcap.

title: Labouré-Roi 2015  Bourgogne Hautes Côtes de Nuits
description: This soft and cushiony wine has light red cherry fruit, gentle tannins and an attractively soft, fruity aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Les Rocailles 2014 Apremont Jacquère (Vin de Savoie)
description: A classic from Savoie, this fresh, crisp wine is fruity, with attractive creamed pear and apple flavors. Light and bright, it's perfect for après-ski in the nearby Alps. Drink now.

title: DFJ Vinhos 2016 Coreto Rosé (Lisboa)
description: This is a simple fruity wine. It has attractive red-berry fruits, giving it a light and bright character. The wine is rounded and smooth, with an attractive lift of acidity at the end.

title: Château de Cérons 2010  Graves
description: While it is light for the structured 2010s, this wine has attractive red fruit flavors and soft tannins. With its gentle structure and good fruity acidity, it's ready soon. Drink from 2015.

title: Joseph Faiveley 2010  Bourgogne
description: Light and fruity, this wine has red fruit and a tannic edge, and bright acidity that gives definition to the fruit. Ready to drink now.

title: Quinta da Lagoalva de Cima 2016 Lagoalva Rosé (Tejo)
description: A ripe, soft wine that is packed with strawberry fruits. It is smooth with a creamy caramel texture that contrasts with the fruity acidity and crisp aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Château Simard 2012  Saint-Émilion
description: Juicy and fruity with acidity and black currant fruits, this wine comes from a vineyard on slopes at the entrance to Saint-Émilion. It's bright and fresh with lively, easy fruits and soft tannins. Drink from 2017.

title: Château Simard 2012  Saint-Émilion
description: Juicy and fruity with acidity and black currant fruits, this wine comes from a vineyard on slopes at the entrance to Saint-Émilion. It's bright and fresh with lively, easy fruits and soft tannins. Drink from 2017.

title: DFJ Vinhos 2004 Grand' Arte Trincadeira Trincadeira (Ribatejo)
description: Fresh and fruity, this is a wine that's all about juicy textures, ripe fruit, touched by dry tannins. Flavors of tomatoes, red plums and a lively acidity.

title: Château de Seguin 2015 Cuvée Prestige  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
description: This is a juicy red-fruit-flavored wine. It has attractive tannins and plenty of acidity. With a fresh crisp aftertaste, it is light and will develop quickly.

title: Sacha Lichine 2013 SLS Single Blend Rosé (Vin de France)
description: Expanding from his Provence château, Sacha Lichine's new rosé is a blend from across the south of France. It's crisp, fruity, with a touch of sweetness, giving a soft, red berry fruit texture and light, fresh acidity.

title: Dona Maria-Júlio Bastos 2016 Rosé (Alentejano)
description: This bright, fruity wine is crisp with acidity from the red-currant flavors. A blend of Aragones and Touriga Nacional, it is light with just a touch of tannin. Drink now.

title: Adega Cooperativa de Borba 2016 Convento da Vila White (Alentejano)
description: This is a soft, fruity blend of Roupeiro, Rabo de Ovelha and Fernão Pires. It is ripe, full of apple and crisp green fruits, shot through with acidity. Drink now.

title: Château Barbanau 2015 L'Instant Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: Pale in color, this is a light, bright style of rosé. It is clean and crisp, with touches of red fruit that float through the attractive fresh acidity. The aftertaste is fleeting and refreshing.

title: Cartuxa 2014 Vinea Tinto Red (Alentejano)
description: Made to be drunk young, this is a fruity red berry flavored wine. It has a bright crisp edge to its fruit as well as light tannins and acidity. It is quite ready to drink.

title: Yvon Mau 2008 Seigneurs de Bergerac Red (Bergerac)
description: In a light, fresh style, this is an attractive red berry fruited wine. There are light tannins, soft strawberry flavors and a light acidity.

title: Kopke 2013 Reserva Red (Douro)
description: This soft wine has muted red fruits and light acidity. Drink now.

title: Herdade da Comporta 2012 Chão das Rolas Red (Península de Setúbal)
description: This is a bright, fruity wine, full of acidity and generous red fruit flavors with a soft texture. This will be ready to drink in a year.

title: Château de Lisennes 2014 Cuvée Tradition  (Bordeaux Supérieur)
description: Red-currant fruit flavors shine through this light fresh wine. Although there are tannins, it is more about the crisp fruits and acidity. Drink this from 2018.

title: Obrigado 2015 Nortico Alvarinho (Minho)
description: A ripe, creamy wine with fine fruit and soft acidity, this is delicious wine to drink now. It has apple and ripe pear fruits along with bright acidity to keep it all fresh. The aftertaste is smooth with just a light tang.

title: José Maria da Fonseca 2014 Periquita White (Península de Setúbal)
description: Fresh and fruity with a crisp mineral and textured character, this is a lively wine that's ready to drink. Acidity and a citrus zestiness give a refreshing lightness at the end.

title: Remy-Pannier 2012 Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
description: Fruity and tangy, this is a light and fresh wine. It has crisp green apples patterned with citrus fruits and a tight, bright texture. Ready to drink.

title: Domaine Pellé 2014 Les Bornés  (Menetou-Salon)
description: Grown on different parcels of chalk and clay soil, this soft, ripe wine is attractive to drink now. The smooth texture is nicely lifted by acidity and fresh citrus flavors. The aftertaste is fresh, crisp and fruity.

title: Barton & Guestier 2013 Passeport  (Beaujolais)
description: Aromatic and fruity, this is a soft and ready-to-drink wine. It has the lightest touch of tannins, a fresh wild-strawberry flavor and a finish that is dry and crisp in acidity. Drink now.

title: Roland Tissier et Fils 2014 Rosé (Sancerre)
description: The wine is fresh, so crisp and fruity. Its red currant fruit and lively acidity are rounded out by a caramel flavor that gives richness. The aftertaste though is dry and packed with fruit. Drink now.

title: Quinta da Lagoalva de Cima 2012 Espirito Rosé (Tejo)
description: An intensely fruity rosé, the palate is full with red berries and spirited acidity. It's very fruity, fresh and crisp with a cool-climate feel of bright, light texture. Screwcap.

title: Domaine Terre de Mistral 2014 Simone Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: This intensely fruity wine revels in its red berry fruits, crisp acidity and general enjoyment of being a summer rosé. It's lively with acidity and a light tang to freshen the aftertaste.

title: Wines & Winemakers 2012 Andreza Códega do Larinho White (Douro)
description: Pear and tangerine notes give this wine an immediately fruity character. It has bright acidity, with a fresh and crisp palate. The fruit is right up front, with a soft aftertaste.

title: J. Portugal Ramos 2016 Pouca Roupa Branco White (Alentejano)
description: This open, perfumed and fruity wine is crisp and bright. It also has a warm, apricot and ripe pear fruitiness that balances the citrus acidity. It's attractive now and ready to drink.

title: Chai de Bordes 2013  Bordeaux Blanc
description: A bright, light and fruity wine that's already delicious to drink. With lemon and green apple fruit, it also has acidity that cuts through the aftertaste.

title: Vignerons de Bel Air 2013 Ancienne Gourmand  (Beaujolais-Villages)
description: Soft, ripe and fruity, this wine is ready to drink. Light tannins shape up the cherry fruits and attractive acidity that cuts right through to the end.

title: Domaine Dupeuble Père et Fils 2014  Beaujolais-Villages
description: For fruity, red-cherry-flavored Beaujolais, look no further. This Gamay wine has it all: soft tannins, intensely juicy red fruits and crisp, tangy acidity at the end. Drink now.

title: Domaine Faiveley 2011  Bourgogne
description: Attractive red fruits dominate this light and fruity wine. Good acidity and bright flavors are smoothed by wood, while the aftertaste brings back the fruit. Drink now.

title: Château Berthenon 2015  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
description: This is a perfumed fruity wine. With its bright acidity and citrus and lychee flavors, it is both crisp and ripe. Ready to drink now.

title: Pratsch 2012 Rosé (Niederösterreich)
description: A fluorescent pink color introduces this soft, full and fruity wine with fine, balanced acidity. There is a touch of caramel, along with crisp acidity from red-cherry flavors. Ready to drink. Screwcap.

title: Domaine de la Denante 2014  Pouilly-Fuissé
description: This wine has soft fruit, a creamy texture and light acidity. It is balanced, fruity with apple and spice flavors. The aftertaste introduces a drier, woody character that is less attractive.

title: Château Lamothe-Vincent 2012  Bordeaux Blanc
description: A soft, lightly tropical wine with attractive acidity and grapefruit as well as pineapple flavors. It is crisp, very fruity and ready to drink.

title: Sacha Lichine 2013 SLS Blend No. 5 White (Vin de France)
description: Soft and creamy, this is a bright, apple and pear fruity wine. It's light and very fresh, layering acidity and a citrus burst at the end. Drink now.

title: Lafage 2015 Chardonnay (Vin de France)
description: This ripe, fruity, rounded wine has a soft texture, rich apricot fruit and just enough acidity. The texture is immediately attractive—fruity with a touch of crispness at the end. Drink now.

title: Domaine de la Forêt 2015 Rosé (Mediterranée)
description: In color, this is almost white. In flavor it is equally light. There is some attractive acidity and the soft wine will slip down easily. The aftertaste is crisp with just a touch of red currant.

title: Obrigado 2015 Nortico Rosé (Vinho Verde)
description: This is a fruity, crisp wine. Red currant and candied red-berry fruits fit into a balanced, just off-dry character. The wine is bright with a light sparkle at the end.

title: Domaine la Taste 2015 Colombard-Ugni Blanc-Gros Manseng-Sauvignon White (Côtes de Gascogne)
description: The wine is bright and fruity. It has crisp acidity and a light touch of citrus to go with the lively acidity. Its blend brings out the herbal flavor of Colombard with just a touch of honey from Gros Manseng. Drink now.

title: Quinta da Foz 2013 Vinha da Foz Red (Douro)
description: This is a fruity, immediately drinkable wine. It has red berry flavors and bright acidity that gives the wine freshness and a light, juicy touch. Light tannins add structure to the bright aftertaste.

title: Casa de Vilacetinho 2013 Vilacentinho White (Vinho Verde)
description: This medium-sweet, fruity wine is both light and crisp. Attractive acidity contrasts with the sparkling texture and the sugared citrus. It's very ready to drink.

title: Les Vignerons Réunis de Monségur 2014 Château Tuilerie Pagès  (Bordeaux)
description: The wine is rich and ready to drink. With red fruits and warm tannins, it is a ripe wine that has a light structure and balanced acidity. It is already an easy wine—fruity and soft at the end.

title: Baron Philippe de Rothschild 2013 Le Rosé de Mouton Cadet Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description: With an attractive pink color and soft acidity, the wine is fruity with red berry flavors and a soft, caramel texture. It's ready to drink while it is still so fresh.

title: Domaine Clos Gautier 2016 Oser Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: This blend of Cinsault, Grenache and Syrah is attractively fruity. It has a crisp texture that gives it a bright character, red-currant fruitiness and intense refreshing acidity. The aftertaste is elegant and fruity. The wine's name (meaning to dare) is an anagram of Rosé. Drink now.

title: Domaine Poli 2015 Rosé (Ile de Beauté)
description: This is a crisp, fruity and perfumed rosé from Sciaccarellu. It has red-currant freshness, bright acidity and a delicious refreshing character. Drink now.

title: Parras Vinhos 2014 Montaria Branco Reserva White (Alentejano)
description: This is a fresh although ripe wine. It has an attractive floral aroma that shows also on the palate with the ripe yellow and white stone fruits. The acidity is well balanced to give a fresh, fruity aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Henri de Villamont 2010 Prestige  (Bourgogne)
description: Bright and fruity, this is a wine to be enjoyed now. It's crisp acidity, but concentrated with creamed-apple flavors and broadened by a touch of wood.

title: Henri de Villamont 2010 Prestige  (Bourgogne)
description: Bright and fruity, this is a wine to be enjoyed now. It's crisp acidity, but concentrated with creamed-apple flavors and broadened by a touch of wood.

title: Aveleda 2015 Aveleda White (Vinho Verde)
description: Lightly prickly on the tongue, this is a refreshing, almost dry wine. It is bright, lively and fruity with citrus and crisp apple flavors. The wine is light and bright with plenty of acidity at the end.

title: Aveleda 2015 Aveleda White (Vinho Verde)
description: Lightly prickly on the tongue, this is a refreshing, almost dry wine. It is bright, lively and fruity with citrus and crisp apple flavors. The wine is light and bright with plenty of acidity at the end.

title: A. de Luze et Fils 2015 Fleur de Sauvignon  (Bordeaux Blanc)
description: This aromatic herbal Sauvignon is crisp while also showing the ripe fruit of the vintage. It is full of citrus and melon fruits, tangy acidity and a bright, fruity aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Colinas do Douro 2014 Branco White (Douro)
description: The wine is soft and ripe. With delicious yellow fruits, a soft texture and just enough lively acidity, it is rich and fruity. There is an attractive orange zing at the end.

title: Colinas do Douro 2014 Branco White (Douro)
description: The wine is soft and ripe. With delicious yellow fruits, a soft texture and just enough lively acidity, it is rich and fruity. There is an attractive orange zing at the end.

title: Château Labrousse 2014  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
description: Fresh and fruity, Jacques Chardat's wine is packed with red-berry fruit along with a dry core. The tannins and acidity will develop well as the wine ages to produce a ripe, fruity wine. Drink from 2018.

title: Bacalhôa Wines of Portugal 2016 Alabastro Roupeiro-Fernão Pires-Antão Vaz White (Alentejano)
description: This crisp, citrus and pear-flavored wine from native Portuguese grapes is very ready to drink with its bright acidity, mineral texture and juicy aftertaste. It is a fine apéritif wine that's fruity and fresh.

title: DFJ Vinhos 2012 Portada Winemaker's Selection Branco White (Lisboa)
description: Soft and creamily fruity, this is an attractive, fresh wine. It has citrus fruit and apple-skin flavors and crisp, clean acidity. For drinking over the next year.

title: DFJ Vinhos 2016 Cara Viva Rosé (Lisboa)
description: This is an off-dry wine, soft with strawberry flavors that are balanced by crisp acidity. It is light and fruity—a fine wine to drink as an apéritif.

title: Michel Picard 2009  Bourgogne
description: Fresh and fruity, this has a ripe apricot character that contrasts the mineral acidity and bright fruit character. The wine dances lightly and is now ready to drink.

title: Michel Picard 2009  Bourgogne
description: Fresh and fruity, this has a ripe apricot character that contrasts the mineral acidity and bright fruit character. The wine dances lightly and is now ready to drink.

title: Domaine des Terres Dorées 2015 L'Ancien  (Beaujolais)
description: This is a delicious, ripe and fruity wine that comes from the south of Beaujolais. It has ripe red-berry fruits and soft tannins allied to a juicy acidity that keeps it all fresh. Drink now.

title: Ravoire et Fils 2012 Domaine Fontanyul Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: Light and bright, this is a fragrant and fruity rosé. On the palate, strawberry flavors are gently caressed with soft acidity, leaving a soft, ripe aftertaste.

title: Louis Chevallier 2014  Mâcon-Villages
description: This wine is soft, simple, fruity and ready to drink. It has apple and apricot tones and light acidity to keep it fresh, with a bright and refreshing aftertaste.

title: Domaines Devillard 2014 Domaine de la Garenne  (Mâcon-Azé)
description: This is a fresh, fruity and apple-crisp wine that is light, buoyant with acidity and shot with citrus. It is lightly mineral, textured and with attractive crispness at the end. The Devillard family bottles this wine on behalf the estate's owners. Drink now.

title: Casa da Passarella 2013 Somontes Rosé (Dão)
description: Attractive and fruity, this is bright and crisp. It does have some weight and a backdrop of ripe strawberries. But it's the fresh acidity that gives lift and freshness. Drink now.

title: Quinta da Pacheca 2013 Colheita Tinto Red (Douro)
description: This ripe, fruity wine has soft tannins and red-berry flavors. With just a touch of spice, it is ready to drink.

title: Le Cercle des Vignerons Saint-Louis 2014 Diamarine Rosé (Coteaux Varois en Provence)
description: Coteaux Varois is a small area in the heart of the Provence vineyards. This wine is fresh, fruity and light in texture. With its strawberry fruits, it has a crisp side and attractive acidity. The wine, with its fresh aftertaste, is ready to drink.

title: Domaine des Gandines 2014 Terroir de Clessé  (Viré-Clessé)
description: Full of the fresh acidity of the 2014 vintage, this light, bright wine has refreshing lemon and crisp apple flavors that are given richness by the lively acidity. Bursting with fruit, it is ready to drink now.

title: Domaine des Gandines 2014 Terroir de Clessé  (Viré-Clessé)
description: Full of the fresh acidity of the 2014 vintage, this light, bright wine has refreshing lemon and crisp apple flavors that are given richness by the lively acidity. Bursting with fruit, it is ready to drink now.

title: Chanson Père et Fils 2013  Mâcon La Roche Vineuse
description: This wine offers fresh lemon and a lightly creamy fruitiness. It is floral in character with attractive acidity. Fruity, with a crisp citrus tang at the end, it is ready to drink.

title: Jean-Max Roger 2015 Cuvée La Grange Dimière Rosé (Sancerre)
description: This is an attractive, soft Pinot Noir rosé. With its ripe red-strawberry flavors, it is rich but has plenty of crisp acidity. The balance and juicy, crisp aftertaste are deliciously refreshing.

title: Pierre Chainier 2016 Château de la Roche Sauvignon Blanc Sauvignon Blanc (Touraine)
description: Ripe while also herbal, this is an easy fruity wine. It has an attractive spice and perfumed white-fruit character that enhances the crisp citrus fruit. Drink now.

title: Casa S.M. de Tourais 2013 São Matias Red (Dão)
description: This is a lightly textured wine with acidity and some firm tannins. It has a fruity character, red berry flavors and attractive acidity. The wine, balanced and generous, is ready to drink.

title: Chateau de l'Oiselinière 2012 Les Illustres Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
description: Lightly wood-aged, this is a smooth and ripe wine. A touch of toast rounds out the fresh fruit flavor of juicy Golden Delicious apple. The wine is dry, crisp and fruity at the end, with bright acidity.

title: Jean-Paul Brun 2015 Pisse Vieille  (Brouilly)
description: This is a ripe, soft and rich cru wine. With its attractive cherries and gentle tannic structure, it is fruity and easy. The acidity that comes through at the end gives the wine a crisp aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Pratsch 2011 Rosé (Niederösterreich)
description: Bright, light, fresh and fruity, this is a perfect apéritif. It has red berry fruit and crisp acidity, and it is smoothed with a touch of vanilla. The herbal finish has bite.

title: Gernot and Heike Heinrich 2010 Red Red (Austria)
description: A blend of Austrian red varieties, this is soft, light and fruity. It has flavors of red fruit and spice from wood aging. With its attractive acidity, this is ready to drink. Screwcap.

title: Henry Fessy 2013  Beaujolais
description: This is a fruity wine with cherry fruits and a soft, juicy texture. It's lively and fresh, with good acidity at the end.

title: Joseph Drouhin 2011  Côte de Nuits-Villages
description: This attractive wine has good acidity as well as attractive red berry fruits. It's ready to drink with its soft fruitiness and light tannins.

title: Château la Colombière 2013 Vinum Negrette (Vin de France)
description: This wine is soft and fruity, with just a minimum of tannin. It offers strawberry and red currant, combining softness with acidity. The aftertaste, with its acidity, is dry while fresh. Drink from 2016.

title: Pezat 2010  Bordeaux
description: A juicy, fruity wine with attractive, bright red-berry fruit flavors. The wine is fresh, touched nicely by some wood and tannins.

title: Gérard Charvet 2014 La Réserve d'Amélie  (Moulin-à-Vent)
description: This is a light and fresh wine with soft tannins and appealing red berry fruits. It offers attractive acidity at the end, a balanced wine that is ready to drink.

title: Château Barbanau 2014 La Girafe Verte Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: Simple and fruity, this is ready for summer drinking. It is very fresh, crisp, lightly textured and with fragrant, refreshing acidity. A touch of pepper gives the aftertaste attractive spice.

title: Jérôme Gueneau 2016 Le Clos Chartier  (Sancerre)
description: A soft style, this is ripe with attractive apple and crisp pear fruits. The wine is refreshing with its acidity lacing through the flinty texture. The wine will be ready to drink from 2018.

title: Château de Pizay 2014 Rosé de Soirée Rosé (Beaujolais Rosé)
description: Light and fruity, this is full of strawberries. The wine has a fresh character with a light touch of pepper and spice. It's attractive, bright and ready to drink.

title: Château de Pizay 2014 Rosé de Soirée Rosé (Beaujolais Rosé)
description: Light and fruity, this is full of strawberries. The wine has a fresh character with a light touch of pepper and spice. It's attractive, bright and ready to drink.

title: DFJ Vinhos 2013 Casa do Lago Rosé (Lisboa)
description: A perfumed wine that is soft and fruity. It has a fresh, tangy character that makes it very refreshing and crisp.Think of this as an apéritif rosé, bright and light.

title: Quinta da Lagoalva de Cima 2016 Lagoalva Vinho Rosé (Tejo)
description: This attractively fruity wine is crisp and full of red currants. Its acidity and soft caramel flavor are nicely blended with the touch of tannin and crisp aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Cheval Quancard 2010 Prestige de Bordes  (Bordeaux)
description: This fruity, light and fresh wine offers easy tannins and red berry fruits. It's rounded and juicy, smoothed by wood aging that gives it a ripe aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Wines & Winemakers 2016 Companhia das Lezirias Herdade de Catapereiro White (Tejo)
description: A crisp blend of Fernão Pires, Arinto and some herbal Sauvignon Blanc, this light and fruity wine is tangy, zingy and packed with lemon and ripe pear flavors. Its acidity shines through to produce a wine that is bright and ready to drink.

title: Manuel Olivier 2012  Bourgogne Hautes Côtes de Nuits
description: Fruit and tannins harmonize in this ripe, soft wine. Attractive red berry fruits and lively acidity partner with a smooth texture. It's not a wine for aging, and will be ready to drink from 2015.

title: Domaine de Thulon 2015  Beaujolais-Villages
description: This banana-flavored wine is soft and gently fruity. It has crisp acidity as well as a light tangy texture. Drink now.

title: Cave Cooperative du Vendômois 2014 Lieu-dit Cocagne Rosé (Coteaux du Vendômois)
description: From one of the small outliers in the Loire valley, this crisp wine made from Pineau d'Aunis is bright and lively. It has fresh acidity, red currant flavors and a light, tight aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Domaine de Terra Vecchia 2015 Vermentinu-Chardonnay White (Ile de Beauté)
description: Vines close to the east coast of Corsica give this bright, light and fruity wine. Crisp acidity is fleshed out with creamed apple and pear fruit. The wine is delicious to drink now.

title: Sousa Lopes 2012 Seleção do Enôlogo White (Portuguese Table Wine)
description: A rich, fruity wine from the north of Portugal. It has creamy apple and citrus flavors, a light and mineral texture and bright acidity. Drink now.

title: Château Rimauresq 2015 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: This ripe, lively wine is bursting with red fruits. Crisp and clean, it features a light mineral character that gives it tight texture balanced by refreshing raspberry and orange flavors. The aftertaste shines with crisp acidity.

title: Campelo 2014 Miranda White (Vinho Verde)
description: This fresh wine shows fruit tones balanced by a light mineral note. It is bright with acidity and grapefruit flavors alongside a crisp aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Campelo 2014 Miranda White (Vinho Verde)
description: This fresh wine shows fruit tones balanced by a light mineral note. It is bright with acidity and grapefruit flavors alongside a crisp aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Château Lauduc 2013  Bordeaux Blanc
description: A wine that is bright, fruity and light in character. The crisp apples and juicy lemon flavors are brightly lit by acidity and a hint of a more steely texture. Drink now.

title: Wines & Winemakers 2014 Monte de Baía Red (Península de Setúbal)
description: Winemaker Leonor Freitas runs her vineyard just south of Lisbon. This soft, fruity blend is light in both tannins and acidity. It's fresh in character, giving a ripe wine that is ready to drink now.

title: Château Tour de Gilet 2014  Bordeaux Supérieur
description: Crisp and fresh, this is a light wine that is dominated by red-currant fruits. It has considerable acidity as well as tannins. Fruity while lightly perfumed, it will be ready from 2018.

title: Château Tour de Gilet 2014  Bordeaux Supérieur
description: Crisp and fresh, this is a light wine that is dominated by red-currant fruits. It has considerable acidity as well as tannins. Fruity while lightly perfumed, it will be ready from 2018.

title: Adega Mãe 2016 Pinta Negra White (Lisboa)
description: This is an attractive fruity wine. With its soft texture, perfumed white fruits and balanced acidity, it is the sort of wine that is ready for a warm day. Drink now.

title: Château Puy Marceau 2014  Bordeaux
description: This wine is fresh and juicy with fine tannins and ripe red berries. Owned by the Baylet family, the estate has produced a full and fruity wine. The aftertaste shows acidity and a light spice.

title: Les Quatre Tours 2016 Classique Rosé (Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence)
description: This is a deliciously fruity wine. It has fine red-currant and citrus fruits that give it a fresh crisp texture and flavor. The attractive wine is so bright with fruit right up front. Drink now.

title: Casa da Passarella 2013 O Brazileiro Rosé (Dão)
description: Fresh, ripe and fruity, this has bright acidity and a tangy, lemon and orange zest texture. Attractive strawberry flavors come along with a touch of vanilla. Drink now.

title: Vieux Château des Combes 2013  Saint-Émilion
description: This 90-acre vineyard has produced an attractive, light wine. Fruity with red-berry flavors, it is already soft and fresh. Acidity and touches of tannin are balanced enough for the wine to be ready to drink.

title: Château Acker-Perreau 2010  Bordeaux
description: This is a fruity, ready-to-drink wine, with acidity cutting through the juicy black currant fruits. This is attractive and bright, yet structured.

title: Domaine de l'Idylle 2015 Mondeuse (Savoie)
description: This wine is light, crisp and fruity, a real cool-climate red offering acidity, smoky black-currant fruit and a pinch of spice. The wine is ready to drink, with a mineral, fruity aftertaste.

title: Dão Sul 2014 Cabriz Colheita Seleccionada Branco White (Dão)
description: With Encruzado and Malvasia in the blend, it is no surprise this wine is deliciously perfumed. It has fresh acidity as well as ripe apple and pear flavors. The wine is fruity, crisp and ready to drink.

title: Adega Cooperativa do Cartaxo 2014 Bridão Reserva Branco Fernão Pires (Tejo)
description: Fresh, fruity and crisp, this is an attractive, refreshing wood aged wine. It has citrus and crisp apple and riper apricot flavors, bright with acidity and needing a few more months to age. Drink from late 2016.

title: Fabre en Provence 2016 Château de l'Aumérade Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: From a Provence estate bearing the name of the family that has owned it for 17 generations, this wine is crisp, fruity and bright. It has a light touch of acidity, as well as red currant and spice flavors. The wine, with its lively aftertaste, is in a fine apéritif style.

title: Georges Vigouroux 2012 Antisto Tradition Malbec (Cahors)
description: This is a full-bodied and soft wine. Full of juicy red fruit flavors and rounded tannins, it's fruity and ready to drink, with delicious acidity at the end.

title: L. Tramier & Fils 2015 Laurent Dufouleur Château Mi-Pont  (Mercurey)
description: This large appellation in the Côte Chalonnaise can produce fruity wines like this. With red-berry fruits and light tannins, the wine has spice and crisp edge of acidity that comes from fruit that was just ripe, surprising in the rich 2015 vintage. The wine will be ready to drink from 2018.

title: Domaine Charly Nicolle 2011 Cuvée Ancestrum  (Chablis)
description: Light and fruity, this has flavors of creamed apple and ripe Williams pear. The wine is crisp and tangy, and it's shot through with lemon zest and acidity. Ready to drink in one year.

title: Domaine Charly Nicolle 2011 Cuvée Ancestrum  (Chablis)
description: Light and fruity, this has flavors of creamed apple and ripe Williams pear. The wine is crisp and tangy, and it's shot through with lemon zest and acidity. Ready to drink in one year.

title: Château Tour Bayard 2013  Montagne-Saint-Émilion
description: The wine has ripe Merlot with red-berry fruit flavors and balanced tannins. It's fresh with the acidity of the year. Here it is contrasted with spice, a smooth surface texture and a ripe cherry aftertaste. This is an attractive wine to drink from 2017.

title: Quinta do Casal Monteiro 2015 Rosé (Tejo)
description: As crisp as possible, this is a light, strawberry fruited wine with balanced acidity and a fresh, delicious aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Norbert Bauer 2009 Altenberg Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
description: Very fresh, crisp fruit, light and with a soft, green plum skin texture. The aftertaste is lively, bright.

title: Norbert Bauer 2009 Altenberg Grüner Veltliner (Niederösterreich)
description: Very fresh, crisp fruit, light and with a soft, green plum skin texture. The aftertaste is lively, bright.

title: Signé Vigneron 2011 Domaine de Montaubourg Gamay (Côtes de Forez)
description: The mountains south of Beaujolais produce a light style of Gamay. This wine is soft, juicy, easy and fruity with red-cherry flavor marked by fresh acidity. Drink now.

title: Vignobles Bonhur 2015 Château Merlet Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description: This fresh, crisp wine has a light salmon-pink color. It bursts with attractive red and citrus fruits to give a bright character plus tight acidity. Drink now.

title: Château du Grand Pierre 2012  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
description: Ripe and fruity, this red-berry flavored wine has good acidity and a crisp, bright texture. The tannins are now well integrated into the fruit, giving a structured, yet fresh, aftertaste. Drink now. In the Chéty family for eight generations, the vineyards were changed to organic in 2011 by sons Olivier and Emmanuel (enologist), who also made major renovations to the winery.

title: Château du Grand Pierre 2012  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
description: Ripe and fruity, this red-berry flavored wine has good acidity and a crisp, bright texture. The tannins are now well integrated into the fruit, giving a structured, yet fresh, aftertaste. Drink now. In the Chéty family for eight generations, the vineyards were changed to organic in 2011 by sons Olivier and Emmanuel (enologist), who also made major renovations to the winery.

title: Domaine Sautereau 2014 Côte de Reigny Rosé (Sancerre)
description: This is a crisp, fruity and well-balanced wine. Along with its red-currant fruit and bright acidity, it has a touch of caramel that adds richness. The wine is ready to drink.

title: Commanderie de la Bargemone 2013 White (Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence)
description: An herbal, very crisp wine, it is unoaked and very bright. It's fresh, fruity, light in color and with citrus fruits running right through. Drink now.

title: Château Sainte Marguerite 2015 L'Esprit de Sainte Marguerite Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: Organic grapes go into this fresh, crisp and fruity wine. With raspberry flavors, it is bone-dry and full of acidity. The wine is refreshing—light and bright.

title: Henry Fessy 2015  Régnié
description: The wine comes from one of the cru estates followed by this negociant house. It is a light, ripe and fruity wine. With its attractive red-berry flavors, finished with crisp acidity, it is accessible and ready to drink.

title: Caves Aliança 2013 Aliança White (Vinho Verde)
description: Soft, fruity and off dry, this is a typically fresh and light-hearted Vinho Verde. Attractive apple and lemon flavors shine through the lightly prickly texture. Drink immediately.

title: Château de Parenchère 2015  Bordeaux Blanc
description: On the eastern end of the Bordeaux appellation, this Gazaniol property reserves 10 of 161 acres for its white blend. This is a ripe, soft wine that is rounded with peach and red-apple fruit flavors. Crisp acidity gives it some tightness to balance the full, fruity character of the wine. Drink now.

title: Trenel Fils 2013  Saint-Amour
description: From the most northerly of the Beaujolais cru, this light wine has both fresh stone fruits and crisp acidity. Its red plum and cherry tastes make it instantly drinkable. The aftertaste is bright and fruity.

title: Gadais Père et Fils 2015 Domaine de la Vieille Cure Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
description: The wine is initially soft with melon and ripe pear fruit. Behind this fruity exterior, there is a crisper citrus character that is bright and light. It's a ripe wine, all fruit with a tighter, mineral aftertaste. Drink from 2017.

title: Fontes da Cunha 2015 Mondeco Branco White (Dão)
description: A blend of Encruzado and Gouveio, this is a soft, creamy and fruity wine. It has no wood aging, emphasizing the ripe apricot and pear fruits. The aftertaste is crisp and bright.

title: La Cave des Vignerons de Pfaffenheim 2014 Pfaff Tradition Riesling (Alsace)
description: Fresh red apple and tangy mandarin flavors unite in a fruity and fun combo. The palate is equally fruit-driven and refreshing, with bright but ripe acidity. This is a light-footed summer apéritif and very moreish.

title: Robert Klingenfus 2010 Signature Pinot Noir (Alsace)
description: Bitter cherry flavors mark a wine that is light in texture, with attractive acidity and a soft, fruity red berry finish. Not for aging.

title: Barton & Guestier 2013 Passeport  (Rosé d'Anjou)
description: Off-dry and fruity, this is a bright, lively rosé. It has a soft texture, aromatic from the Grolleau in the blend and with light acidity at the end. Drink now.

title: Château Sainte Roseline 2012 Perle de Roseline Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: Deliciously attractive wine, crisp and clean as possible. It has a light caramel edge along with a more fruity aspect. To finish, the wine is light and bright.

title: DFJ Vinhos 2012 Casa do Lago Branco White (Lisboa)
description: A light and soft wine, this is fruity, with gentle acidity. Apples and lemon juice flavors complement each other to give a bright and fresh aftertaste. Screwcap.

title: Falua 2015 Tagus Creek Shiraz-Trincadeira Red (Alentejano)
description: An open, ripe and fruity wine made to be drunk young, this has black currant and spice flavors, plenty of acidity to keep it crisp and balanced tannins. The aftertaste is bright and lively.

title: Domaine Jacourette 2015 L'Ange et Luce Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: From vines not far from Mont Sainte-Victoire, this fruity wine is full on the palate. A touch of spice accompanies the ripe strawberry flavors. It's rich with a soft aftertaste and light acidity.

title: Florent Descombe 2015  Beaujolais-Villages
description: Ripe, soft and fruity, this is a black-cherry-flavored wine. It has a good balance between the fruit and the crisp acidity, giving a wine that is both rich and bursting with fruitiness. Drink now.

title: Domaine Pfister 2011 Tradition Pinot Gris (Alsace)
description: This is a light, fruity wine that's ripe with perfumed quince and tropical fruit flavors. The palate is satisfyingly balanced with tight, bright acidity. This is wine that is not for aging, and ready to drink now.

title: Domaine Pfister 2011 Tradition Pinot Gris (Alsace)
description: This is a light, fruity wine that's ripe with perfumed quince and tropical fruit flavors. The palate is satisfyingly balanced with tight, bright acidity. This is wine that is not for aging, and ready to drink now.

title: Rigal 2014 Les Fiefs d'Anglars Malbec
description: This is a light fruity wine with surprisingly few tannins for a Malbec. It does have red fruits and some juicy acidity along with a bright aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Stadt Krems 2012 Grüner Veltliner (Kremstal)
description: This is a ripe, open and fruity wine, that's still very fresh and crisp. It has fragrant apple flavor, soft texture and a bright and juicy core that radiates a rounded character with finishing acidity. Screwcap.

title: Bougrier 2015 Alain de la Treille Le Rosé Rosé (Vin de France)
description: Soft and gently fruity, this has red-currant as well as red-plum flavors lightly cut with acidity. The aftertaste is soft, almost off dry. It is immediately attractive and drinkable.

title: Bougrier 2015 Alain de la Treille Le Rosé Rosé (Vin de France)
description: Soft and gently fruity, this has red-currant as well as red-plum flavors lightly cut with acidity. The aftertaste is soft, almost off dry. It is immediately attractive and drinkable.

title: Patient Cottat 2012 Le Grand Caillou Pinot Noir (Vin de France)
description: This ripe, fruity wine is ready to drink. With red berry fruits and fresh acidity spiced with wood flavors, it's an easy wine that is ripe and soft.

title: Cave des Vignerons de Mancey 2013 Domaie Touzot  (Mâcon-Villages)
description: Fruity and crisp, this bright wine offers flavors of lemon and fresh apple juice. A tangy lemon-zest texture gives great acidity and a refreshing aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Trenel Fils 2014  Chiroubles
description: The highest of the Beaujolais crus at 1,400 feet, Chiroubles produces deliciously crisp and cool wines. This wine has that character with its bright red-cherry flavor and light acidity. It is perfumed, fruity and ready to drink.

title: Deco Provence - Villa Azur 2015 Rosé (Coteaux Varois en Provence)
description: This is a soft fruity wine with ripe strawberry flavor. It has a touch of pepper as well as crisp acidity in the background. Drink now.

title: Henri Schoenheitz 2011 Cuvée Saint Grégoire Pinot Noir (Alsace)
description: Spicy and fruity, this is a lightweight, attractive and smooth wine. It has some undergrowth aromas, followed by red berry fruits, with fresh acidity at the end. Drink now.

title: Barrière Frères 2006 Jacques Sans Souci  (Bordeaux Blanc)
description: Less successful than the red Jacques Sans Souci, this nevertheless has some attractive fresh citrus and green plum flavors and bright fresh acidity. Simple fruits and a light green apple structure give it a good, crisp finish.

title: Véronique Günther-Chereau 2016 Château de la Gravelle Sur Lie  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
description: This fruity wine is ripe with crisp red apples. It has acidity as well as a touch of pepper, although the main thrust of the wine is the rich fruitiness and rounded texture at the end. Drink now.

title: Producteurs Plaimont 2013 Colombelle L'Originel White (Côtes de Gascogne)
description: A blend of Colombard and Ugni Blanc, this crisp, light wine is as fresh as a daisy. Fruity and aromatic, it offers citrus and melon flavors. The fruit explodes in the mouth, leaving a light, bright aftertaste.

title: Domaine de la Sauveuse 2011 Cuvée Château Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: Delicately perfumed, this is an attractive, fruity wine.It layers acidity and a light tannic edge with white fruits and red currants. There is a soft vanilla aftertaste.

title: Winenot 2014 Les Jolies Filles Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: Ripe, fruity and full of spice, this is a fresh wine. With its light color, it is a perfect summer quaff, crisp with red currants and with a light, fragrant aftertaste.

title: Château d'Esclans 2013 Whispering Angel Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: This attractively rounded wine has a fine balance between red fruits and a crisp texture that is lined with vanilla. It is light in the mouth, fruity, fresh at the end and ready to drink.

title: Cooperativa Reguengos de Monsaraz 2014 Monsaraz Tinto Red (Alentejo)
description: This soft, ripe and fruity blend of local grapes is young and spicy. It has flavors of ripe red fruits that are cut with juicy acidity. It's a fresh wine that is ready to drink.

title: Vincent 2014 JJ Bourgogne Blanc  (Bourgogne)
description: This attractive, fruity wine has refreshing acidity and clean lemon and orange zest flavors. It has a creamy side as well, giving a smooth, soft aftertaste that balances with the fresh acidity. Drink from 2016.

title: Domaines Devillard 2010 Château de Chamirey  (Mercurey)
description: Fresh, soft and fruity, this is brightened by a jammy red-fruit flavor and light acidity. It has a juicy character, with underlying attractive, gentle tannins.

title: Domaines Devillard 2010 Château de Chamirey  (Mercurey)
description: Fresh, soft and fruity, this is brightened by a jammy red-fruit flavor and light acidity. It has a juicy character, with underlying attractive, gentle tannins.

title: Château de la Vieille Tour 2016  Bordeaux Blanc
description: In the Boissonneau family since 1839, this southern Entre-Deux-Mers vineyard gives a crisp, herbal wine with light fruit and attractive acidity. It has lemon and grapefruit flavors, bright with a crisp aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Château Sainte-Luce Bellevue 2014 Tradition  (Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux)
description: This wine from Bruno Martin's 3.3-acre vineyard is going to be a fresh and fruity. Already it has a fine juicy character and plenty of red fruits. Crisp acidity at the end confirms this bright character.

title: Chateau Peyrassol 2014 Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: Very pale in color, this soft and gently fruity wine is almost ethereal in its lightness. It's fresh with attractive acidity, a touch of red currant and orange and refreshing at the end.

title: Albert Bichot 2013  Saint-Véran
description: A crisp wine, this is packed with acidity and fruitiness. It is tangy, tight, full of attractive acidity as well as lively citrus and white fruits. It is ready to drink.

title: Château Briot 2013 Réserve Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
description: Fresh red berry flavors and crisp acidity give this light and almost dry wine an attractive crisp quality. A squeeze of lemon adds to the freshness.

title: Domaine Guillaman 2012 Rosé (Côtes de Gascogne)
description: Soft and fruity, this is an attractive, light and perfumed rosé. It has delicious vanilla flavors, red and white fruits all laced with a good citrus element and a bright aftertaste. Screwcap.

title: Château d'Haurets 2012 Red (Bordeaux Rosé)
description: Lightly fruity and fresh, a wine that has some crisp acidity although without much definition. The aftertaste is clean, bringing out attractive citrus and red currant fruits. Screwcap.

title: Casal da Coelheira 2016 White (Tejo)
description: It is the Verdelho that gives this wine its attractive, perfumed character. Crisp and bright with a tangy, lemon zest texture, the wine is rich. fruity and ready to drink.

title: Fiuza 2016 Oceanus Red (Tejo)
description: This is a simple, fruity wine, balanced and with red-berry fruits. It has soft tannins and a line of attractive acidity, and is ready to drink.

title: Château de la Chaize 2015  Brouilly
description: The wine is fruity, bright and with cherry flavors. With its soft tannins and juicy acidity, it is a cru wine to drink young. The aftertaste is all fruit.

title: Caves Velhas 2015 Serradayres Reserva White (Tejo)
description: A blend of Arinto and Fernão Pires, this is a citrus flavored wine. With bright lemon acidity and a soft texture, it also has tropical pineapple fruit flavors that give the wine a soft, fruity aftertaste. Drink now.

title: DFJ Vinhos 2015 Grand'Arte Alvarinho (Lisboa)
description: A soft, creamy wine full of apple and pear fruits that are edged with crisp acidity. It is ripe, but still young; drink this attractive wine from 2017.

title: Jérôme Gueneau 2016 Domaine des Grandes Perrières Rosé (Sancerre)
description: This warm fruity wine is rounded and ripe with flavors of vanilla as well as red-berry fruits. It is soft with just a light tang of orange zest and finishing acidity. Drink this attractive wine now.

title: Quinta do Passadouro 2010 Late Bottled Vintage  (Port)
description: Berry fruit flavors give this wine a light, fruity character. It is stalky and fresh with acidity, showing a light aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Union de Vignerons de l'Île de Beauté 2014 Domaine Petroni Rosé (Corse)
description: This attractive and fruity wine blends Niellucciu with Sciacerellu, both local Corsican grapes. The freshness is right there, crisp and hinting at red currant flavors and bright acidity. Drink now.

title: Union de Vignerons de l'Île de Beauté 2014 Domaine Petroni Rosé (Corse)
description: This attractive and fruity wine blends Niellucciu with Sciacerellu, both local Corsican grapes. The freshness is right there, crisp and hinting at red currant flavors and bright acidity. Drink now.

title: Bailli de Bourg 2011  Côtes de Bourg
description: Fresh and fruity, it has ripe blackberries, soft tannins and a fresh aftertaste. It presents an attractive smoky character along with vanilla and a rich aftertaste.

title: Quinta do Casal Branco 2016 Terra de Lobos Rosé (Tejo)
description: Fruity, young and soft, this is an attractive Touriga Nacional-Syrah wine with strawberry flavors and just a touch of crisp red currant acidity. It's made for this summer, ready to drink.

title: Les Frères Couillaud 2014 Château de la Ragotière Vallet  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
description: This is a beautifully fruity wine with great acidity and citrus flavors contrasting with ripe apple and melon fruitiness. The wine is cool, crisp, full of juicy acidity, and ready to drink now.

title: Les Frères Couillaud 2014 Château de la Ragotière Vallet  (Muscadet Sèvre et Maine)
description: This is a beautifully fruity wine with great acidity and citrus flavors contrasting with ripe apple and melon fruitiness. The wine is cool, crisp, full of juicy acidity, and ready to drink now.

title: Château Haut-Bourcier 2013  Blaye Côtes de Bordeaux
description: This wine is all crisp red currants and acidity. Fresh, fruity and lightly textured, it is a wine to drink young, from 2016.

title: Delaforce 2014 Tinto Red (Douro)
description: This lightly oaked wine is full of fruit, ripe with red berries and crisp with acidity, just hinting at Douro minerality. That makes for a balanced fruity wine that with its soft tannins is ready to drink.

title: Delaforce 2014 Tinto Red (Douro)
description: This lightly oaked wine is full of fruit, ripe with red berries and crisp with acidity, just hinting at Douro minerality. That makes for a balanced fruity wine that with its soft tannins is ready to drink.

title: Henry Fessy 2014 Nouveau  (Beaujolais)
description: This wine is ripe, with attractive red cherry fruit flavors. It bursts with fruitiness, fresh acidity and just the lightest structure.

title: Château Saint-Didier-Parnac 2014 Prieuré de Cénac Mission Malbec-Merlot (Cahors)
description: Bright and fruity, this accessible wine is ready to drink. Fresh and packed with red berries, it is juicy and fresh. The aftertaste, with its acidity, has a touch of spice. Drink now.

title: Château Saint-Didier-Parnac 2014 Prieuré de Cénac Mission Malbec-Merlot (Cahors)
description: Bright and fruity, this accessible wine is ready to drink. Fresh and packed with red berries, it is juicy and fresh. The aftertaste, with its acidity, has a touch of spice. Drink now.

title: Casa de Cambres 2014 Colheita Red (Douro)
description: A young and fruity wine that is soft with gentle tannins and juicy black currant fruit flavors. It is ripe, fresh and balanced with generous acidity at the end. Drink now.

title: Château la Gordonne 2015 Verité du Terroir Rosé (Côtes de Provence)
description: This wine is full of fresh acidity, with a soft, gentle fruitiness that is immediately attractive. With its light touch of raspberry and red currant, it is poised and stylish.

title: Clos Poggiale 2015 Vermentino (Corse)
description: This is a perfumed, citrus and apricot-flavored wine. It is crisp, with a ripe character that fills the mouth with rich fruitiness. It has a light, mineral structure and a long, fruity aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Clos Poggiale 2015 Vermentino (Corse)
description: This is a perfumed, citrus and apricot-flavored wine. It is crisp, with a ripe character that fills the mouth with rich fruitiness. It has a light, mineral structure and a long, fruity aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Jean-Luc Baldès 2011 Château Labrande Malbec (Cahors)
description: A light and fruity wine, gently tannic while showing firmness at the edges. Red berry fruits dominate to give good acidity and an attractive fresh aftertaste.

title: Henry Fessy 2015  Beaujolais
description: A soft banana and cherry-flavored wine that has attractive acidity and only the lightest of tannins. It is bright, fruity and ready to drink.

title: Bernier 2012 Chardonnay (Val de Loire)
description: A crisp, fruity, unoaked Chardonnay. It has bright apple and fresh squeezed lime. This is very light and finishes with great acidity. Screwcap

title: Georges Vigouroux 2011 Pigmentum Ugni Blanc-Colombard (Côtes de Gascogne)
description: This is properly fresh and fruity, with delicious herb and ripe apricot notes. Light, refreshing and crisp, this is ready to drink.

title: Jean-Luc and Paul Aegerter 2014  Pouilly-Fuissé
description: Vinified in new 500-liter oak barrels, this wine is fresh, fruity and crisp. It has attractive acidity, a strong streak of minerality and lively lemon fruit. With a taut, nervy edge, the wine has a bright aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Château Larrivet Haut-Brion 2016 Le Bordeaux de Larrivet Haut-Brion Blanc  (Bordeaux Blanc)
description: This wine from Maison Ginestet is all crisp, green fruit. Light and bright, it bursts with acidity and perfumed fruitiness. Drink now.

title: Château Larrivet Haut-Brion 2016 Le Bordeaux de Larrivet Haut-Brion Blanc  (Bordeaux Blanc)
description: This wine from Maison Ginestet is all crisp, green fruit. Light and bright, it bursts with acidity and perfumed fruitiness. Drink now.

title: Commanderie de la Bargemone 2012 Rosé (Coteaux d'Aix-en-Provence)
description: Lively, crisp wine from an estate founded by the Knights Templar in the 13th century. It is full of delicious red fruits, light acidity and a nervy, mineral aftertaste.

title: Joseph Fritsch 2013 Pinot Blanc (Alsace)
description: This is a lively and fruity wine. It is crisp while also revealing a more creamy, stewed-apple character. Light acidity and a tang of citrus keep a fresh aftertaste.

title: Jean-Claude Debeaune 2013 Domaine Lenoir  (Mâcon-Villages)
description: Tight, crisp and fruity, this is a refreshing and bright wine. Lively acidity cuts right through the lightly mineral texture. Full of fruit, fresh and lively, this should be drunk now.

title: Dourthe 2015 La Grande Cuvée  (Bordeaux Blanc)
description: Dourthe's 100% Sauvignon Blanc is lively and crisp—a light, bright wine. With its strong citrus flavors, lemon and tangerine, touched by spice, it is balanced and fruity. The texture gives a herbal edge that is attractive and refreshing.

title: Cortes de Cima 2011 Chaminé Red (Alentejano)
description: Forward, fruity and crisp, this is an attractive wine. It's red berry flavor and bright acidity is layered with smoky tannins. Not for aging, so drink over the next 2-3 years.

title: Chassenay d'Arce 2005 Blanc de Blancs Millésimé Brut Chardonnay (Champagne)
description: A soft style of Blanc de Blancs, rounded as much as crisp, this is an attractively ripe and fruity wine. Apple and grapefruit flavors are filled out with perfumed acidity and a lively, fresh aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Quai de la Lune 2015 Rosé (Bordeaux Rosé)
